name: pos-electron
description: A minimal Electron application for Odoo POS

scripts.deb64: electron-packager . app --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ && electron-installer-debian --src dist/app-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64
scripts.rpm64: electron-packager . app --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ && electron-installer-redhat --src dist/app-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch x86_64
scripts.flatpak64: electron-packager . app --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ && electron-installer-flatpak --src dist/app-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch x64

author: GitHub
